Get a header field [PHP]

23 Sep 2013

I'm surprised PHP has getallheaders() and headers_list to retrieve ALL headers but no function for retrieving a single header.

Here is a quick one using headers_list()

 1 <?php
 2 // echo get_header('X-HTTP-Method-Override');
 3 function get_header($field) {
 4     $headers = headers_list();
 5     foreach ($headers as $header) {
 6         list($key, $value) = preg_split('/:\s*/', $header);
 7         if ($key == $field)
 8             return $value;
 9     }
10 }
